activities: CotterWeb Enterprises, Inc., and its subsidiary, InboxPounds Limited (collectively “CotterWeb”), provide online loyalty club programs that allows individuals to participate in incentive-based activities that include completing offers, online shopping, market research activities, conducting online searches, and watching videos for a wide variety of advertisers and vendors.  Individuals may choose to become members by completing an online registration process which entails providing personal contact information and optional demographic profile information.  Members may choose to participate in various programs offered by advertisers and provide further information and feedback about products or services.  Member data received by CotterWeb is maintained and processed in the United States to provide and facilitate program services, technical support, research, contact and billing.  CotterWeb may also contract with third party providers to render call center and support services.
recoursemech: For unresolved complaints, CotterWeb will cooperate with EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs)
